remarks.para: Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. This class uses the property to enable scaffolding in a Dynamic Data Web Site.
Scaffolding enhances ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required.
